_sText: This map, de_rio, is a medium-small bomb defuse map for CS:S. The A bomb site is inside a building with a simple layout but many approaches. The B bomb site is on a dock with shallow water underneath. I have a detailed page for this map at my personal website with design notes, annotated screen shots and video of me running around in the map. Let me know if you like it or want to see something get changed. Something I forgot to add is that the map looks like garbage in HDR. I didn't realize my skybox and lighting was all tuned for LDR so I suggest playing it in LDR only.
